prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of William Stanley Braithwaite, Accession # 6787-a, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was deposited on 23 April 1970.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection includes letters from William Stanley Braithwaite to Miss Brown and to Mr. Gilchrist and a printed contract.

did.unittitle: Letter from William Stanley Braithwaite to Miss Brown 18 May 1915
Letter from William Stanley Braithwaite to Miss Brown 14 May 1918

scopecontent.p: Contract between William Stanley Braithewaite and The Four Seas Company for Browning Centennial Poems.
